mapper.select: select * from shipping where username=#{username} and isDefault=#{isDefault}
select shipNum from shipping where username=#{username} and isDefault=#{isDefault}
select min(shipNum) from shipping where username=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into shipping(shipTitle, shipName, shipPhone, shipAddress, postcode, isDefault, userName) values(#{shipTitle}, #{shipName}, #{shipPhone}, #{shipAddress}, #{postcode}, #{isDefault}, #{userName})
mapper.update: update shipping set shipTitle=#{shipTitle}, shipName=#{shipName}, shipPhone=#{shipPhone}, shipAddress=#{shipAddress}, shipDefault=#{shipDefault} where shipNum=#{shipNum}
